Subbed Projects.Show Name: Harukanaru Toki no Naka de 3: Kurenai no Tsuki

Good Comments: Decent, clean and clear-cut, good explanations when needed. Bonus props for color-coding.
Best subs for Persona. A few typos etc due to being speed subs, but pretty good translations (and I like the blue text)
Clear and concise language. Subs match the background color and are unobtrusive.
Fluently translated subtitles, good encoding, nice font.
Typesetting was ugly and inappropriate. They also "summarize" the script rather than translating it as it is. THE PEOPLE WHO MADE POSITIVE COMMENTS DON'T KNOW A SHIT ABOUT REAL JAPANESE.
Some of the lines are worded oddly and there are grammatical and punctuation errors everywhere.
no mistakes fit nicely good style
Bad Comments: Very nice translating, a little too literal in ep01, but definitely made it work in ep02. Font choices are excellent and go well with the PERSONA feel.
Excellent, hardly any mistakes whatsoever. The people who made some of the negative comments are exaggerating.
doesn't really flow, minor translation error
I didn't see any of the group's subs in the site where I get my fansubs from.
